title: OpenAI Developer Event – India
issuer: OpenAI & Ministry of Electronics and IT (India)
description: Participated in the OpenAI Developer Event in India, gaining insights into reasoning models, agentic AI frameworks, and real-time APIs. Networked with Sam Altman and professionals from OpenAI, Zomato, Capgemini, and emerging AI startups.

title: Kaggle Days Meetup Delhi NCR (5th Edition)
issuer: Geek Room, Kaggle Days Delhi NCR Community
description: Attended Kaggle Days Meetup focused on ML-powered decision making, context engineering for enterprise data, and AI applications in finance. Engaged with Kaggle experts and industry professionals.

title: McKinsey Forward Learner Program
description: Completed the McKinsey Forward Learner Program with a focus on structured problem-solving, data-driven decision making, and professional skills for real-world business challenges.

title: Hackathon Finalist (5 National-Level Hackathons)
description: Qualified as a finalist in five national-level hackathons by building AI-driven and full-stack solutions under competitive timelines, demonstrating strong problem-solving and rapid prototyping skills.

title: Mentor – Apertre 3.0 Open Source Program
description: Selected as a mentor for the Apertre 3.0 Open Source Program, guiding contributors on open-source development, code quality, and best practices while supporting collaborative project delivery.

title: Hackathon Organizer – Code Veda & Vedathon
description: Organized two large-scale hackathons: Code Veda at Microsoft Gurugram with 7,000+ participants and Vedathon at Opstree Global with 3,500+ participants. Led end-to-end planning, partnerships, execution, and community engagement.
